collectible.title: Neptune's Pudding
collectible.subtitle: Neptune's favourite egg pudding.
collectible.text: A cup of egg pudding, Neptune's favourite. It has been sitting in her dress pocket the whole game. It is sweet in flavour and slightly warm, just the way she likes it. Yum!
collectible.unlock: Impress Neptune enough with your poker skills for her to grace you with this most sacred of dishes! (Win a game against her)
